hero.subheading: The #1 AI retention agent that spots at-risk customers before they churn and wins them back automatically, turning hidden churn patterns into automated win-back campaigns.

growth.heading: The Silent Churn That's
growth.subheading: 30% of your customers will ghost you this year.
points: You chase new leads, spend on ads,
and bleed money trying to replace customers you already earned.
growth.cta: But what if you could stop churn before it starts?

aiAgent.heading1: Meet the AI Agent That Turns Lost
aiAgent.description: Plusfive spots silent, unhappy, or inactive customers before they churn, then sends powerful campaign flows that win them back automatically. Built on real data, 3000+ tested variations, hundreds of businesses, thousands of customer interactions. And it gets smarter every day, optimizing itself based on your industry's live behavior.

whatHappens.subheading: Plusfive works silently in the background, analyzing user behavior and predicting churn. It sends timely messages to win back customers, recovering revenue and optimizing retention while you sleep.

rows.text: Stop losing customers before it's too late
rows.how: AI churn detection flags risks in real time
Smart, personalized campaign flows re-engage them

rows.text: See who's Active, At Risk, Lost

rows.how: Pre-built campaigns tested in hundreds of businesses

rows.text: Get instant alerts when satisfaction drops
rows.how: Automated service rating and notification system
Retain more customers with zero acquisition costs
Smart QR code for easy customer referrals

beforeList: No idea who's about to leave

Perfect to see your churn risk before upgrading

plans.name: Enterprise

features: Manage multiple businesses under one account

faq.heading: FAQ
faq.subheading: Sure! Here's a well-crafted FAQ entry starting with 'What is churn prediction?' and following with other key questions and concise answers relevant to Plusfive:

questions.a: Churn prediction uses AI to identify which customers are likely to stop using your service, so you can take action before they leave.

questions.q: Can I recover customers who've already left?
questions.a: Yes! PlusFive helps you re-engage lost customers with personalized campaigns and offers.

questions.q: How long until I see results?
questions.a: Most businesses see measurable improvements in retention and revenue within the first month.

questions.q: Do I need to be technical?
questions.a: No technical skills needed! PlusFive is designed for business owners and teams of all backgrounds.
Absolutely. PlusFive provides clear dashboards showing revenue recovered and customer loyalty growth.

faq.ctaHeading: Don't Let Another Customer Slip Away
faq.ctaText: Plug Plusfive into your business today and watch revenue come back without spending a cent on ads.

realResults.heading: Real Results. Real Businesses.
realResults.subheading: We have 1k+ positive reviews from our customers who are loving using PlusFive.

userSupport.howToCreateQRCode: How do I create a QR code?
userSupport.howToCreateQRCodeAnswer: To create a QR code, navigate to the QR Management section from the sidebar. Click on "Generate QR Code", fill in the required details, and your QR code will be generated instantly.
userSupport.howToViewPerformance: How do I view my performance?
userSupport.howToViewPerformanceAnswer: You can view your performance analytics in the Analytics section. It provides detailed charts and metrics on your monthly performance, customer LTV, and more.
userSupport.howToUpdatePayment: How do I update payment details?
userSupport.howToUpdatePaymentAnswer: To update your payment details, go to the Subscription & Billing section. From there, you can manage your payment methods and update your billing information.
userSupport.whatIsCustomerLTVAnswer: Customer Lifetime Value (LTV) is a metric that represents the total revenue a business can reasonably expect from a single customer account throughout their relationship. Our platform helps you track this.

userCard.secureDescription: All payment information is encrypted and securely stored with protection.
